name: Cindy Lin
content: Cindy Lin - Assistant Professor, Georgia Tech ︎ CINDY LIN 林凯莹 PublicationsAbout CV I am the Stephen Fleming Early Career Assistant Professor at the School of Interactive Computing at Georgia Tech. I am an ethnographer of data infrastructures and environmental governance in Southeast Asia and the United States. More ︎ Click on book covers for open access versions of Digital Energetics and Technoprecarious.
